alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:48PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lander, north central Nye and southern Eureka Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 247 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 16 miles east of Hickison Summit, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Hickison Summit, Eureka Airport, Monitor Valley, Table Mountain, Antelope Peak and Mount Jefferson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
